stimulusHtml: Which of the following correctly describes sources of legitimacy in two AP course countries?
choicesHtml: The United Kingdom and Nigeria both rely heavily on elections as a source of legitimacy.
Russia and the United Kingdom both depend largely on the charismatic authority of leaders as a source of legitimacy.
Although China relies entirely on economic growth as a primary source of legitimacy, Mexico relies on charismatic authority of its leader.
Although Iran relies primarily on elections to foster legitimacy, Russia relies on charismatic authority of its leader as a primary source of legitimacy.
